## User Experience (UX), Recruitment, Testing and Training Services

### Government of Canada Tender Number
CRA-2023-00004

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Tender Description

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites bids from qualified contractors to provide User Experience (UX), Recruitment, Testing, and Training services to the Digital Design and Production directorate on an as-and-when-requested basis.

The proposed services include UX recruitment, testing, and training to support the directorate's mission. The contract will be awarded for a period of one year, with options to extend the term by up to three (3) times for a period of one year each.

### Key Requirements

*   The contractor must have expertise in UX recruitment, testing, and training.
*   The contractor must be able to provide services in either English or French.
*   The contractor must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
*   The contractor must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation and evaluation criteria.

### Evaluation Criteria

*   Technical Merit (40%): The contractor's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation and provide high-quality services.
*   Price (30%): The contractor's price for the services.
*   Past Performance (20%): The contractor's past performance on similar projects.
*   Capability (10%): The contractor's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation and provide the required services.

### Bidder Selection

The following criteria will be used to evaluate the bids:

*   Bidders must submit a proposal that meets all the requirements of the solicitation.
*   Bidders must be able to provide the required services in either English or French.
*   Bidders must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
*   Bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation and evaluation criteria.
